nodes.bodyText:
should we check that getWatchPort() is not null?
The watch_port and watch_group fields are only required for fast failover groups, and may be optionally
implemented for other group types.
4 lists of ints... what can be better...

nodes.bodyText: Do not represent a finite and short set of available values so generic. It must be enum or keep numeric representation, same as in OF spec and translate it into enum somewhere outside the transport layer.

Can you stop using this approach for "new" code? I suppose to use SpeakerCommand API for "new" code.
The worst part of this approach - this request will block one of FL thread up to 10 seconds.Not worse but still bad - it uses not reliable "channel" in communication to the switch.
